mapper.update: update tbl_floor set floorName = #{name}, supplierId = #{supplier.id}, categoryId = #{category.id}, specId = #{spec.id}, colorCodeId = #{colorCode.id}, veinId = #{vein.id} , sellPrice = #{sellPrice}, description = #{desc} where id = #{id}
mapper.select: select f.id as f_id, f.floorName as f_floorName from tbl_floor f where f.floorName = #{floorName} and 11=11
select f.id as f_id, f.floorName as f_floorName from tbl_floor f where 11=11 and f.floorName = #{floorName} and f.id != #{floorId}

select f.id as f_id, f.floorName as f_floorName, fp.picPath as fp_picPath, t.tenantName as t_tenantName from tbl_floor f join tbl_floor_picPath fp on f.id = fp.floorId join tbl_tenant t on t.id = f.tenantId where 11=11

select f.id as f_id, f.floorName as f_floorName, f.sellPrice as f_sellPrice, f.description as f_description, f.number as f_number, s.id as s_id, s.supplierName as s_supplierName, c.id as c_id, c.categoryName as c_categoryName, sp.id as sp_id, sp.specName as sp_specName, cc.id as cc_id, cc.colorCodeName as cc_colorCodeName, v.id as v_id, v.veinName as v_veinName from tbl_floor f join tbl_supplier as s on s.id = f.supplierId join tbl_floor_category as c on c.id = f.categoryId join tbl_spec as sp on sp.id = f.specId join tbl_color_code as cc on cc.id = f.colorCodeId join tbl_vein as v on v.id = f.veinId where f.id = #{id}
